website_summaries.verdict: A biodegradable boat wash designed to protect against and remove the harsh effects of salt on your boat hull and engine.
pros: Does a decent job of tackling and getting rid of the salt residue
Comes with a hose mixture device so you don't have to guess about the right concentration
cons: The pump that comes with this is not very good quality and tends to fall apart

customer_reviews.title: Outperforms the competition
customer_reviews.text: Last season, I used a competing brand that was priced cheaper. That brand's mixing device leaked horribly and produced very little suds when rinsing my boat or flushing my engines. Needless to say, I was shocked when I tried the Salt Away brand this season. Not only does the hose mixture device not leak but the amount of suds produced was 10 fold that of the competition. I am a firm believer in this product now and it will be my go to from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: This product was recommended by a fishing buddy
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by a fishing buddy. I was shocked at how well it worked. The first time I tried it after a day fishing on SF bay. I usually have to rinse the boat down then brush it with boat wash , then dry the boat. A lot of work. This time I used Salt away as a rinse and motor flush. No salt, none. It was great. I'll never go salt water fishing without this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New way to clean!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a game changer. It creates a nice think foam and sud combo that is then easily rinsed off. My seats and vinyl haven’t looked this good after a run in a long time. The cap is very convenient for switching off and on between suds and rinse. I don’t need a mit, and soap any more. Just this!
customer_reviews.author: NZ84

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: So I have a Yamaha AR210 jetboat which I have been having overheating issues. I do a quick flush before I transport the boat to the boat ramp and of course do another flush after I am done for the day. Havent had any issues since. Gets more foamy/soapy than other products I have used which is good. If the price would come down i would certainly buy a gallon of this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Romeo Hotel

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says, I use the ferry’s and live near the ocean. Use it to get the salt spray off where regular soap and water don’t cut it . I have noticed since I use salt away the corrosion on bolts and nuts isn’t as prominent. I have ended up using it more than I thought. It gives me a peace of mind
customer_reviews.author: NC Swamp Man

customer_reviews.title: O-Ring, Keep an Eye On It
customer_reviews.text: Keep and eye on the o-ring! I've only had one opportunity to use this mixing unit to flush our engines. Our boat is kept in the water and it was at night, but after the first use the o-ring disappeared. For some reason it is easy for the o-ring to become dislodged from the seat. Went to use it for a second time and I could not because the cup would not seal, this cause me to go on a 'wild goose chase' to locate the proper o-ring for this mixing unit.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent salt removal
customer_reviews.text: The product itself worked very well. Washed the boat and then rinsed with salt away. The next day there was zero salt residue on the boat. The dispenser is the weak link. I attached it per the directions to my pressure washer in-take and there was leakage around the mixing unit even though the connections were tight. I hope the dispenser holds up to regular useage.
customer_reviews.author: C. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: No problems
customer_reviews.text: I took extra precaution using this product due to reviews indicating broken flush valve. I used a step stool to support the hose so it was not just dangling off the flusher, then slowly turned on the water (we have pretty decent pressure) the flush started foaming and after sitting and rinsing seemed to get a lot of build up out of the block. And the flush valve is still intact and I see no reason why I won't be able to use the whole bottle without breaking the valve.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is fantastic. We have a boat on the gulf and ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is fantastic. We have a boat on the gulf and everytime we are done with a trip I wash it down. This stuff seems to not only get rid of the salt deposits but also leaves the gel coat shinning. I also use it to flush engines. A little pricy but not when protecting your investment.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Needs better attachment construction/useability
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it is good - but I hate the fact that the attachment doesn't include the spinning attachment that you see at the end of all hoses. I have to spin the entire attachment around my hoses on both ends - which makes for a difficult setup when cleaning out the exhaust port of my jet ski.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Hope it is as good as everyone says at inhibiting corrosion.
customer_reviews.text: Used once so far. Seems to work as described. Members of the boat community and research shows it works to keep corrosion to a minimum. Hoping it works as well as everyone says. It takes a few extra seconds to use the product. Very easy to use. Well worth it to keep corrosion down and my engine working.
customer_reviews.author: MG - Orlando

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: We use this to flush out our marine engine. People swear by it. We shall see
customer_reviews.author: Joel Prather

customer_reviews.title: Great solution terrible mixing unit
customer_reviews.text: Product itself works great. Unfortunately no matter what I try the mixing unit around where you have the product resulting in tons of waste. Such a disappointment since the solution not only works great for flushing but also washing after a day out on the gulf.
customer_reviews.author: BigD

customer_reviews.title: Good Product Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: We were told to get this for our Jetboat and use with every flush. Easy to use, decent price for what it is, now we will see how well it holds up longtime but a lot of ppl we know use it and say it really works
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Sprayer is junk, wastes more product than it uses
customer_reviews.text: If your goal is to have the product leaking in your driveway then please proceed. the mixer they provide with this unit is good for 1-2 uses before it starts leaking on every use. Do yourself a favor and buy a different mixer.
customer_reviews.author: jryan

customer_reviews.title: Garbage mixing unit
customer_reviews.text: The mixing unit is garbage. It got stuck on my jet ski and I've tried everything to get it off. I'm going to have break the plastic cup to get it off my ski.
customer_reviews.author: Rkon23

customer_reviews.title: Must have for boats
customer_reviews.text: This product is a must have if you have a boat. The product is so effective that Elon Musk uses it on the space station landing strips in the ocean. Owner of business is super sweet lady as well and very knowledgeable
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Marie

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best brand out there.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised and easy to use, but still have some overheating problems, which this might cure for someone else. I haven't as yet, changed my water pump impeller, so can't say one way or the other.
customer_reviews.author: tropical36

customer_reviews.title: Salt away good but flush attachment crap
customer_reviews.text: Love the salt away, expensive but works! But the motor flush attachment is junk. Leaks like crazy from day one. Waste of money but what option do we have, no other. Wasting the salt away by using it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris and Trish

customer_reviews.title: Poor application device
customer_reviews.text: Seems like the liquid part is working but the device that applies the product is poor. So it doesn't put out a consistent concentration . If you want to use a small amount for say a 6 hp outboard by the time the product comes out it is so diluted that it isn't strong enough to do much.
customer_reviews.author: Suneshop

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for flushing out my outboard engine. I also use this to wash down my boat after a day out on the ocean fishing. The product works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work...
customer_reviews.text: I've used several times on my jet-skis, both for flushing the engines and for washing-down the bilges. Seems to apply a decent film that keeps everything from rusting-up. So-far, so-good...
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Could use improvement
customer_reviews.text: Works ok, but dilutes as it's used with the hose attachment. Use the saltaway with your syphon on your pressure washer and you'll be fine
customer_reviews.author: Smilin' Moose

customer_reviews.title: A must have for a saltwater boat
customer_reviews.text: Use this product every time I use my boat. Seen an improvement in my impeller performance. Also use it to wash the boat down. Works great
customer_reviews.author: Robbyp

customer_reviews.title: Approved by my husband!
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to my husband to keep his new boat in good shape. He used it today and said it does work well and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Long

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: The dispenser can be fickle, but works well and the salt away is a must have on salt water use equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Uliv1ce

customer_reviews.title: Adapter makes you go through saltaway too fast
customer_reviews.text: Hose adapter is terrible, you will go through 6 ounces of salt away within minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Cleans salt off
customer_reviews.text: I used this in Electric brake fresh water rinse system, along with rinsing salt water off of boat. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Purchased at Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend product from friends. Used as a follow up rinse to fresh water after salt water flooded campground and got part way up trailer and motorcycle, to neutralize and minimize damage from the salt. Nice kit, easy to follow instructions, just fill, attach and spray. I'm sure it's great for boats and Jet Skis also. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I was suspect of how well this worked. After the first use I am a believer. It removes the salt and leaves an almost waxed look on the fiberglass.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Hontz

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: If you run your boat in salt water a lot - use this. there's simple no salt residue left on my boat. Works as described!
customer_reviews.author: Den Asbury

customer_reviews.title: The first order arrive damage, two days after I received the replacement, very satisfy
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product to flush your boat motor, if you wand to extends the live of ypur motor you ahould use it
customer_reviews.author: Jose R Arrieta

customer_reviews.title: to small to expensive
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking that was a bigger container i think is to expensive
customer_reviews.author: Josue Almodovar

customer_reviews.title: I like the product, hate the dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I feel the salt away solution works great for flushing my outboard, boat and equipment, but the dispenser keeps breaking at the same place each time. Those dispensers are not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Ryoshi

customer_reviews.title: Works as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and provides a level of security that your engine will be protected.
customer_reviews.author: Mobill79

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Works well for washing down boat and trailer after fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: used as directed
customer_reviews.text: Used over 1 year ago after saltwater trip. Trailer is doing good a year later.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Genuske

customer_reviews.title: damaged
customer_reviews.text: package came in damaged. the hose kit was seperated from the salt and damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Jin Kim

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have!!!
customer_reviews.text: The attachment for our water hose is the only way to go with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Nunn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect! I’ll never be without this product again for cleaning a boat. It takes much of the work out of the job.
customer_reviews.author: DAB

customer_reviews.title: Great to flush the boat motor.
customer_reviews.text: Comes as described and it's a nice size. Will use this daily to flush our motors on our boats. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Roxie Schwans

customer_reviews.title: worked great so far---- Don't forget the hose adaptor/mixer unit when ...
customer_reviews.text: Used once, worked great so far---- Don't forget the hose adaptor/mixer unit when ordering(a must have!)
customer_reviews.author: Robert Brink

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product must use.
customer_reviews.text: I use it on my 17 scout open fishing. Remembers all the salt from the motor and cleans and shine's the boat in between washes to remove all the Salt.
customer_reviews.author: Joann Wuenstel

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I use this as an after flush for my outboard motor for my boat . We fish in salt water regularly so I use this product which provides peace of mind that I’m doing everything possible to preserve my new motor for extended life.
customer_reviews.author: Cari Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Works great when parked next to the Gulf
customer_reviews.text: This is easy-on, easy-off product and does a great job in removing salt residue when I am parked adjacent to the Gulf of Mexico.
customer_reviews.author: jim Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The stuff works. Use it to flush a boat motor and rinse off salt spray
customer_reviews.author: Rev J.

customer_reviews.title: Leaked during shipment. Can’t comment on its effectiveness
customer_reviews.text: Leaked during shipping will note product much smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.author: Straight from NYC|AJ B

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Instructions clear and complete. I don't personally know how effective this is for prevention of salt buildup, but 2 experienced mechanics have recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard E. Fischer

customer_reviews.title: both the solution and the mixer are working fine. Based on prior reviews
customer_reviews.text: So far, both the solution and the mixer are working fine. Based on prior reviews, I have been careful handling the plastic mixer, not dropping it, over-tightening it, etc. and it has performed well. I can see that the slightest careless handling could damage it, it is, after all, plastic.
customer_reviews.author: JohnK

customer_reviews.title: No salt
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great little pricey but it gets the job done. Stops salt damage so overall it is actually cheap insurance
customer_reviews.author: T. Linson

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well.
customer_reviews.text: I hope this stuff works. It seems to make a lot of foam and the first time I used it there was a lot of rust that came out but since it's been pretty clean. I hope this keeps my boat working for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Lionel G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product I use it to rinse my boat motor the boat and my rod after every trip and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: WORKS GREAT, SPRAY MY BOAT EVERY TIME WE COME IN AND NEVER HAVE TO BRUSH ANYMORE
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the fast service to receive this product
customer_reviews.text: I love the fast service to receive this product. Love the product but the lid was cracked and the sprayer liked in one spot which I can fix with the right fixing product.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Flajole

customer_reviews.title: Delivery and the product
customer_reviews.text: The product is incredible. Removes all the built-up salt on my boat and outboard motors. Ordering it from Amazon and the delivery was effortless
customer_reviews.author: stacy Rossman

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product worked really well & was easy to use. Was having a problem with outboard motor overheating due to salt buildup, didn’t really think the product would work but flushed out the motor with it and problem gone!!
customer_reviews.author: Wrenn Norvell

customer_reviews.title: Inverted the motor and filled system with higher concentration than recommended and left if for several hours
customer_reviews.text: this eventually worked on a salted up cooling jacket in an outboard motor. A long, laborious process. Inverted the motor and filled system with higher concentration than recommended and left if for several hours, repeated several times. Back breaking !
customer_reviews.author: dana woods

customer_reviews.title: Time saver
customer_reviews.text: Simplicity at its best. Really saves time and does a great job
customer_reviews.author: Steamer

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and the service was top rate too. You need the mixing nozzle but it just does the work by spraying
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The hose value is supposed to connect to the existing ...
customer_reviews.text: The hose value is supposed to connect to the existing port on the SeaDoo and it does not. I have not been able to use it because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Harris

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Worked as intended, no visible rust after a trip to the ocean
customer_reviews.author: ThorntonMellon

customer_reviews.title: The best. Use it on the cars and fishing gear ...
customer_reviews.text: The best. Use it on the cars and fishing gear as well. Lots of salt in the air near the Pacific.
customer_reviews.author: William Yaremchuk

customer_reviews.title: As Expected
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected. Even used on some high pressure hoses and kit held up to the challenge
customer_reviews.author: High Tech

customer_reviews.title: It works, it simple works.
customer_reviews.text: It works, plane and simple. My Fitch motor was sounding the "hot" engine alarm and the engine would be very sluguish. As soon as i gave Salt away treatment it all changed and now me engine runs great! Thanks Salt Away.
customer_reviews.author: gus

customer_reviews.title: Works much better than just hosing it down with water.
customer_reviews.text: Works much better than just hosing it down with water. Seems to have gotten rid of the salt on the hull of the boat!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: The solution works great for our jet skis
customer_reviews.text: The solution works great for our jet skis. Unfortunately, the pump/spray attachment is very cheaply made and immediately fell apart. Had to re-buy a separate attachment.
customer_reviews.author: carlyryan

customer_reviews.title: What a difference
customer_reviews.text: People have told me about this for a long time and i finally got it and it works great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The product is great and I've used for years. The container is cheap plastic and broke during the second use.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great but expensive!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff use it all the time but I am starting to realize that its extremely expensive to use when you fish as much as I do, and that some baking soda being alkaline will clean just as good and be ok tor the environment and you can practically buy a 55 gallon drum for 25$. Might switch over to that soon.
customer_reviews.author: Dare2bDefiant

customer_reviews.title: wow really works
customer_reviews.text: worked just like they said washed off salt with no residue
customer_reviews.author: Fred Glen Schramm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This works great. We boat in brackish water and the salt away is used after every boat use.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Massie

customer_reviews.title: Love the salt away
customer_reviews.text: Love the salt away. Mixer is way too expensive and doesn't seem to be high quality. Do believe the salt away has been good for my motor. Use it every time. Only use it for my motor as it is pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Scouting4reds

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way. It hardly took any to wash down my entire jet ski.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: This product is great. I know that it works
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. I know that it works. But if you drop the sprayer or have unusually high pressure hose lines, the sprayer will break. Im on my fourth sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Jbk

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product.
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned the insides of the Honda outboard surprisingly well. This is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Flyer

customer_reviews.title: Use sparingly
customer_reviews.text: Takes the salt right off of the boat! No scrubbing or wiping needed! Will continue to buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: SALT AWAY
customer_reviews.text: Works great but the jar cracked and you can't buy a new one!!! Just a pair and one is much bigger than I can use. Come on Salt Away sell us just another jar.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerJim

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Use it on my Ski after every outing in the gulf. Everything they state is true.
customer_reviews.author: matt skovly

customer_reviews.title: Mixing Unit
customer_reviews.text: I had a fluid leak at the o-ring where the mixing ratio was significantly distorted causing excessive use of the product. I called the company. Excellent service. They sent out a new mixing unit, new bottle, and a pressure reducer to attach to the hose. The technician suggested that adding a pressure reducer protects against water pressure surges that can damage the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey

customer_reviews.title: gallon no
customer_reviews.text: was supposed to be a gallon. Turned out out be a quarte. watch the bait and switch
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It worked just as advertised. The real proof will ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked just as advertised. The real proof will be in a year when I service my out board again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product may work, but flimsy mixing unit
customer_reviews.text: I assume that the product is doing its job, but the mixer leaked the first time I used it (pinhole leak where the fresh water intake connects to the mixing unit lid.
customer_reviews.author: Joe - Florida

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A must for all outboard motors in the ocean. Outboard mechanics swear by it. My shipment arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge A. Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Such a good price that can't be beat with the free shipping
customer_reviews.text: Such a good price that can't be beat with the free shipping. I run it through my outboards every month or so and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Zac Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The attachment leaks but for price i fixed easy with jb weld.
customer_reviews.author: offroader

customer_reviews.title: Get a g clean mixer instead
customer_reviews.text: Complete garbage plastic/leaky mixing unit. Salt away itself may or may not help in cleaning your engine but these units are garbage! Do yourself a favor and get a "G Clean high pressure detergent applicator" for use in powerwashers. I found it recommended on a boating forum and it's well built and can handle high pressure without leaking. I still Use earmuffs on outboard and it works great
customer_reviews.author: Bill Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One treament got rid most of the salt residue in my engine(waverunner). LOVING IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Raul M Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: salt away excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This product works excellent on my boats and fishing gear. I use the mixer to inject the product into the motor and spray down the boat. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: It melts the stubborn caked salt spray away off of boat and truck, also flush my outboard motors it's really good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Redfin

customer_reviews.title: This is all I use on my boats and also ...
customer_reviews.text: This is all I use on my boats and also use it washing my cars. Minimizes the spotting and makes the vehicle shine.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. It does everything that it claims to ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. It does everything that it claims to do.
customer_reviews.author: ioannis Spiropoulos

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: crap delivery system, broke after just two-three uses, buy your own rig
customer_reviews.author: W.

customer_reviews.title: Bought for long term use
customer_reviews.text: only used for a short time on outboard motor in salt water, not sure of results yet?
customer_reviews.author: chief

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work?
customer_reviews.text: I just started to use this product. It works on removing the salt slim from the boat only time will tell with the outboard motor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic item. It foams much better than the 'other' anti-salt product that basspro sells. I've been an offshore fisherman for almost 20 years and this is the best salt spray on the market!
customer_reviews.author: David Kast

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to clean the Jet Ski
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Jet Ski, it came with everything needed. 32oz isn't much, but I use very little each time, so this should last a while.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended to protect your boat engine and parts from corrosion. So I use it. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: dr frank

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality
customer_reviews.text: little cheap but it does the job, dont expect it to last
customer_reviews.author: Rob B.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Product!
customer_reviews.text: I live across the street from the beach and Salt-Away works great on my air conditioner and pool heat pump.
customer_reviews.author: K S Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time 3 weeks ago. I left the boat in the water for a week, when I brought it home I used Sat Away to clean the motor, trailer and the boat. I did not have the connections available at the time, for the dispenser to fit on to the "muffs" so I put the salt away in the water in a large plastic container to flush the motor, and it worked fine. Afterwards I used the water in the container to clean the boat and trailer I guess i haven't seen the full benefits yet, but from all reports its a winner
customer_reviews.author: Rick Bassett

product_meta.title: Salt Away SA32M Concentrate Kit with Mixing Unit, Salt Removing Cleanser, 32 Fl. Oz.
product_meta.description: Salt-away< br/> concentrate W/mixing unit < br/> exterior wash and Inboard/Outboard/Jet engine flush. 100% non-toxic biodegradable and non-hazardous. Used to remove SALT from larger objects such as cars boats personal watercraft sails machines towing vehicles trucks Trailers and transport vehicles. 32 oz. Concentrate is available W/mixing unit or purchase mixing unit separately. Recommended as the Starter kit for many applications. Mixing unit connects to garden Hose and its receptacle holds 4 oz and withstands water pressure up to 60 psi. < br/>< br/> size: 32 FL. Oz.
feature_bullets: Used to Remove SALT from larger objects such as cars boats personal watercraft sails machines towing vehicles trucks trailers Transport vehicles
This product is made in the U.S.
